insertCourse: INSERT INTO courses (course_name, max_students, brief, description, teacher, start_time, class_hour, current_num, course_tag) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
updateCourse: UPDATE courses SET course_name = ?, max_students = ?, brief = ?, description = ?, teacher = ?, start_time = ?, class_hour = ?, current_num = ?, course_tag = ? WHERE course_id = ?
incrementCurrentNum: UPDATE courses SET current_num = current_num + 1 WHERE course_id = ?
decrementCurrentNum: UPDATE courses SET current_num = current_num - 1 WHERE course_id = ?
